entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
